titleStmt.title: To the Kings most Excellent Majestie. The humble petition of the inhabitants of the county of Glocester. With their protestation to his Majestie. Whereunto is annexed Sir Edward Hales, his worthy speech in Parliament, Ian, 20. 1641. Vpon the reading of the letter, which his Majestie sent to both Houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Hales, Edward, Sir, 1575 or 6-1654.

titleStmt.title: To the Kings most Excellent Majestie. The humble petition of the inhabitants of the county of Glocester. With their protestation to his Majestie. Whereunto is annexed Sir Edward Hales, his worthy speech in Parliament, Ian, 20. 1641. Vpon the reading of the letter, which his Majestie sent to both Houses of Parliament.
